timeline.message:
fixes representation propery key in discovery, adds thing documentation, removes some blank lines, adds author to CODEOWNERS, runs spotless formatter.

Signed-off-by: Dan Cunningham <dan@digitaldan.com>

timeline.bodyText: The "Thing Configuration" section should have a table (similar to the channels above), which lists and describes the different parameters. It should NOT include the textual configuration example (which usually is provided in a "Full Example" section). I see that the whole README does not really follow our template for the docs...
timeline.author: kaikreuzer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -42,6 +42,12 @@ After adding the Inbox item, enter the user name and password from the physical
 | humidity           | Number             | Humidity                     |                                                        |
 
 
+### Thing Configuration

replies.bodyText: Agreed, i'll clean up the README
replies.author: digitaldan

 When you've set the username and password, make a note of these, as you'll need

timeline.bodyText: Could you add a column on whether it is mandatory or optional?
timeline.author: kaikreuzer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,17 +15,31 @@ without HTTPS and authentication, the binding doesn't support it, in an effort
 to provide as secure an installation as possible.
 
 When you've set the username and password, make a note of these, as you'll need
-to enter them in the thermostat configuration in OpenHAB.
+to enter them in the thermostat configuration in OpenHAB.   
 
 
-## Usage
+## Supported Things
 
-### Discovery
+| Thing Type           | Description                                                                                  |
+|----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
+| colorTouchThermostat | A Venstar ColorTouch [ColorTouch](http://www.venstar.com/thermostats/colortouch/) thermostat |
+
+## Discovery
 
 Once the binding is installed it will attempt to auto discovery Venstar thermostats located on the local network.
 These will appear as Things in the system Inbox. 
 After adding the Inbox item, enter the user name and password from the physical thermostat in the Thing's configuration.
 
+## Thing Configuration
+
+### ColorTouch Thermostat
+
+| Parameter | Description                                                                                                            |

replies.bodyText: (and in case of optional, what default is used?)
replies.author: kaikreuzer
